summary:
Realistic Ingots in HD!
Modification changes models, textures, physics and effects of INGOTS on more realistic in HD.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][b][color=#ff0000][size=6]Realistic Ingots in HD![/size][/color][/b]


[size=5][color=#00ff00]Modification changes:[/color]
[/size]
[size=3] - Models (remodeled and smoothed)
 - Textures (diffuse, normal, specular, environment)
 - Physics (more realistic)
 - Effects (normal, specular, environment)[/size]


[color=#00ff00][size=5]What ingots are changed:
[/size][/color][size=4][color=#b6b6b6]- Iron Ingot[/color]
- Silver Ingot
[color=#cfe2f3]- Quicksilver Ingot[/color]
[color=#999999]- Steel Ingot[/color]
[color=#bf9000]- Corundum Ingot
[/color][/size]
[color=#ffff00]
Other ingots soon.[/color]



[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=4]Instalation:[/size]
[/color]
[/font][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]Copy the Data folder and overwrite it with the existing one in the main game folder.
[/font][/size]


[/font]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/DPZBj9Q.jpg[/img]

[size=6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68186?][img]https://i.imgur.com/Fz6Sfql.jpg[/img][/url]

files.name: Realistic HD Ingots - Better Performance
files.changelogHtml:
Optimized cubemaps from 8192kb to 256kb.
Improved normal and specular maps.
